sentences.english: Piscine mouth shoe, afterwards follow on current goes this year, if show, toe is like concealed, very sexy.
sentences.chinese: 鱼嘴鞋，今年继续流行，脚趾若隐若现，十分性感。

sentences.english: The perceptual shape of the light appearing elusively in the dark, a unique charm of optic artistry.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜里若隐若现的感性造型，独具光影艺术魅力。

sentences.english: The Cathedral of Notre Dame in Amiens looms in the early morning mist.
sentences.chinese: 亚眠的巴黎圣母院在晨雾中若隐若现。

sentences.english: Dramatic prominences can sometimes be seen looming just beyond the edge of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 日珥有时候在太阳的边缘若隐若现。
远处若隐若现的车流喧嚣。

sentences.english: The glimmering girl then calls Aengus by name.
sentences.chinese: 若隐若现的姑娘然后，叫了安古斯的名字。

sentences.english: The Other is not simply the locus in which truth stammers.
sentences.chinese: 大它者不仅是真理若隐若现的轨迹。

sentences.english: The light fog The light fog shrouds the gleaming mountains.
sentences.chinese: 《轻雾》轻雾笼罩着群山，若隐若现。

sentences.english: The piccolo peeped the tune, the violins sang languidly .
sentences.chinese: 短笛若隐若现，小提琴浅吟低唱。

sentences.english: The world is threatened, too, by a looming new arms race.
sentences.chinese: 若隐若现的新的军备竞赛对全世界产生了太大的威胁。
